      • onAction

        public void onAction()

        Called by the Server once an action was received.

        Throws:
        - if any invalid action is done, i.e. game rule violation

      • onRoundBasedAction

        public void onRoundBasedAction()

      • checkWinCondition

        public WinCondition checkWinCondition()

        Checks if a win condition in the current game state is met. Checks round limit and end of round (and playerStats). Checks if goal is reached

        Returns:
        WinCondition with winner and reason or null, if no win condition is yet met.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()

        At any time this method might be invoked by the server. Any open handles should be removed. No events should be sent out (GameOver etc) after this method has been called.

      • start

        public void start()

        Server or an administrator requests the game to start now.

      • onPlayerLeft

        public void onPlayerLeft()

        On violation player is removed forcefully, if player has not violated, he has left by himself (i.e. Exception)
